txt.en: 'Marvelously done, [placeholder]! Marvelously done indeed. Your wonderful performance is deserving of a worthy gift.'
'Not at all what I was expecting [placeholder], I suspect that you may not be concentrating on the task at hand. Try once more if you have the determination!'
The Mightiest Blow (Basic)
Now you should slot your club as a skill -- the fight will begin soon
'Now that you wield the mighty dwarf-club, you should enter the fight-arena and show others your strength! Stop at nothing, [placeholder]; do not let them deter you from your charge!'
You did not enter the fight area in time
The fight has begun! You may begin swinging

The fight-arena is the lowered floorspace in the centre of the arena, marked by green banners. The dwarf-club is in your inventory.

Gísli Strongclub has given you an excellent weapon to use during the contest. You should enter the fight-arena below while wielding your mighty dwarf-club.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the fight-arena after entering, your club will not be usable outside of the fight-arena's bounds.</rgb>
Knocked a competitor out of the way ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The fight-arena's bounds are in the centre of the ale-hall at Thorin's Hall, marked by green banners.

You should wait for the fight to begin.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the fight-arena and the contest begins, you will fail the quest.</rgb>
This round has ended; you were unable to best your fellows in time

Show everyone that you are a mighty competitor, give the other participants a good whack and send them reeling! \n\nSome competitors may stop moving to take the glorious beer, knock them away while you can!
You ran out of time
Gísli Strongclub is in the arena at Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should speak with Gísli Strongclub to boast of your excellence in the glorious beer event.
You have dropped your mighty dwarf-club in the shock of shame and defeat
This round has ended; you were unable to best your fellows in time
You ran out of time
Enter the fight-arena before the fight begins. Do not leave the bounds
Slot the dwarf-club in your skills and wait for the fight to begin
Give fellow players a whack for good measure ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Gísli Strongclub before the time expires
Give greedy fellow players a whack for good measure ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Do not leave the fight-arena
Talk to Gísli Strongclub before the time expires

You have been challenged to enter the glorious beer contest in Thorin's Hall, where the mighty compete for prizes and glory.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Greetings! Are you here to participate in the glorious beer games?

'Take this mighty dwarf-club and prepare to swing it at your fellow competitors. 

'There are different aspirations and requirements for contestants, feel free to talk to me to learn about each one.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The mighty dwarf-club will appear in your inventory. You may quickslot it to participate more effectively in the fight. This item cannot be used outside of the arena's bounds.</rgb>
